::Balacknightmare/Bat-probes/Dragonfly/Perceptor::

"Are all here?" asked annoyed Blacknightmare

"Just we have to wait at Perceptor..." answered Dragonfly.

Suddenly a transmetal mole appeared and said them "Am I arrive late?"

"We should speak in order to fix our .... fail" said cooly Balcknightmare
